replies.msg: 講事實,你肯定附近建築物冇狙擊手？

寫大字報 林鄭見到實好撚驚呀
CLS 70年代咩 有上網有LIVE

幫我傳岀去，#國際線 #SOS

拍一段片，冇樣但見頭盔，變聲，影校園環境！千祈唔好有個人特徵！Send完即刻del！

清晰地照讀是旦一段：

「Don’t let the HK and Chinese gov convince the world we are rioters. We started as peaceful protestors but now we must defend our city. Please don’t forget us」

「“We are the protestors of Hong Kong. We are not all students, but all citizens who have been pushed to a point of no return.」

「If this is the final stand, do not forget us. Do not underestimate China and HK gov of what they are capable of”」

「We’ve all seen what Chinas capable of — see Tiananmen Square. We don’t know if today is the day where we are next.」

「Hong Kong will never be normal again, no matter who wins. Only difference Is if we will have any human rights anymore or not」

「Carrie Lam and Chinese government is trying to divide us, to weaken the movement.
We aren’t Rioter, we are student, we are fighting for Hong Kong Core values, basic human right and liberty .5 demands not one less」

send返比admin @bbllhk

replies.msg: 點解上天台寫大字要用人命黎達成？

[緊急] 號角聲 行動 立即響起

SOS, 全港火警鐘表態, 現在! Do it NOW!
聽唔到附近響鐘就更加要行動! 一觸即發 破窗效應!

叫醒扮瞓的人睇住黑警點殘害學生!

家長車亦需要警鐘bloc, 走火警人bloc, etc

其實上天台都係想make noise 我覺得有用
網上文宣只係D軍師講香港發生咩事，但上天台就係第一身做事
當然配合埋網絡文宣就最fit啦，始終都要有事先有得文宣既
上之前咪call定記者影到實囉，咁和平既代表意見方式夠瞻出槍既話 (比空手搶槍更無威脅)
咁就肯定係真核彈

至於講到話上去死硬，其實要開槍射你，企邊都係死，企係後面都可以屈9你衝擊，上天台至少係和平之舉

國際會出聲有咩用
外判革命攞埋歩槍指你個頭
都仲諗住外國會有人救你
救你個個係batman定ironman

quote.msg:
幫我傳岀去，#國際線 #SOS

拍一段片，冇樣但見頭盔，變聲，影校園環境！千祈唔好有個人特徵！Send完即刻del！

清晰地照讀是旦一段：

「Don’t let the HK and Chinese gov convince the world we are rioters. We started as peaceful protestors but now we must defend our city. Please don’t forget us」

「“We are the protestors of Hong Kong. We are not all students, but all citizens who have been pushed to a point of no return.」

「If this is the final stand, do not forget us. Do not underestimate China and HK gov of what they are capable of”」

「We’ve all seen what Chinas capable of — see Tiananmen Square. We don’t know if today is the day where we are next.」

「Hong Kong will never be normal again, no matter who wins. Only difference Is if we will have any human rights anymore or not」

「Carrie Lam and Chinese government is trying to divide us, to weaken the movement.
We aren’t Rioter, we are student, we are fighting for Hong Kong Core values, basic human right and liberty .5 demands not one less」

send返比admin @bbllhk
